name: Surface Tension (itch) (PeterEldredge)
description:
Surface Tension is a game that was created in 5 weeks by a team of 5. This was our first "big" project as a team. We are still planning on cleaning up the game a bit, so we would appreciate some honest feedback from anyone who tries it out. Thank you so much to anyone who gives it a go, we all put a lot of time into it.

Credits

Peter Eldredge - Developer/Designer

Jake Dixey - Developer/Designer

Drew Graham - Developer

Mark Schwiegershausen - Designer/Artist

Ian Morales - Lead Artist

Chris Rivera - Music/Sound effects
